Tim Vantilborgh is Full Professor at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel. 
He works in the Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences, where he is a member of the Work and Organizational Psychology research unit.
He also works as an independent data science consultant as founder of e.videns.

### Research

My research focuses on two main topics: psychological contracts and employee wellbeing. 
Moreover, I am interested in understanding workplace phenomena better by adopting a temporal lens and by integrating a dynamic systems perspective.

### Teaching

I teach courses to students in the Bachelor and Master of Psychology programs at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel:

-   Research Methods and Techniques I: Psychometrics
-   Research Methods and Techniques II: Quantitative Methods
-   Evidence-based Human Resources Management
-   Case studies evidence-based Human Resources Management
